description:
Love lingerie? So do we! 

Adore Me redefines lingerie to make beautiful fashion affordable for everybody. Feel sexy, have fun, and adore the new you!

With our new app, you’ll enjoy access to mobile-only lingerie sales, exclusive offers plus catch sneak peeks of new collections on the go! 

  Download now to enjoy:  
* Our awesome style quiz—think Tinder, but meet lingerie you’ll love instead! 
 *  A personalized showroom in your size, new every single month! 
* The best lingerie ever—bras in 30A-42G and intimates in XS-XL and beyond 
* Free shipping, always, and lingerie sets from $39.95! 
* Hot deals on sexy bras & panties, corsets, sleepwear, swim and more  
* Check your push notifications for fun deals (Hint: FREE panties + more!)
 * And now, shop or skip the month directly from your phone – it’s so easy! 
* Holiday themed lingerie collections—YES, PLEASE.
 * Collect VIP reward points through the app. 
 * Customer service is just a tap away, we’re here for you!

Here’s what some members had to say:
 "I like it a lot!! The app is easy to navigate and great prices!!:) " @roehrig_24 
"Love!!l Love!!! Love!!! This app love you're products!!! I was so excited to see I did not have to spent a ridiculous amount of money on bras (as I'm a 36G) I was so excited when I received my bra set and it fit like a glove!! Can't wait to order again!!!" @amgagne 
"This app is fantastic. It allows you to view your orders and account info. It is an easy way to order bras anywhere for a much better price than VS. It loads quickly and is easy to navigate. Anyway, for a bra freak like me, this app is great!" @CimanomBetty 

 Love The New App? Help us get the word out! Please take a moment to rate and review our app. Or, drop us an email at iphonefeedback@adoreme.com

We’re Social! Join The Fun.
http:// facebook.com/adoremeofficial
http://twitter.com/AdoreMe
http://instagram.com/adoremeofficial
http://pinterest.com/adoremeofficial
http:// youtube.com/user/AdoreMeTV
releaseNotes:
Hello Adorable,

You deserve the best—update now to enjoy our awesome new features!

What’s in it for me?
- Black Friday promotions – get excited!
- No more crashing, we’ve stabilized the app
- Debugged for lightning-fast speed

Sound good? Update now!
